title: [Self-directed] Technology-centered Assessment and Instructional Improvement Course for Enhancing Computing Education Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational programming and computing concepts
context.additional_context: Learner cohort comprising professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Practical environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD), with a focus on applying computing technologies to solve societal issues

learning_goals: Learners can apply core computational problem-solving skills (algorithm design, data analysis, system integration) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze their technical performance abilities and develop improvement plans based on formative assessment feedback
Learners can design and implement computing solutions for real-world societal problems through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
